Value:
The Federation Main Station is gone.
[PAUSE=1]
A superstructure shattered. A tyrant’s spine, snapped.
[PAUSE=1]
Fire blooms in the void where their hold once pulsed.

The sector exhales.
[PAUSE=1]
No more patrols. No more fines. No more shackles of law disguised as order.
[PAUSE=1]
The stars feel wider now.

You are no longer fugitives.
[PAUSE=1]
The bounty boards go dark.
[PAUSE=1]
Your names fade into silence, not because they forget—
[PAUSE=1]
—but because no one dares come looking.

Ancient tech. Forgotten wealth. Secrets with teeth.
[PAUSE=1]
And now, they’re yours to take. No questions. No witnesses.

Peace is never permanent.
[PAUSE=1]
But in the wreckage of empires, we thrive.
[PAUSE=1]
And the void has never felt more like home.

This is where the story of the revolution ends...
[PAUSE=1]
And where story of the chaos starts...
